question: Joe was a pen pal with 14 people. He stopped being penpals with 1 of them. They each send 4 letters a week that are 11 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 11 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Joe is penpals with 14-1=<<14-1=13>>13 people
Thus he gets 13*4=<<13*4=52>>52 letters a week
So he writes 52*11=<<52*11=572>>572 pages a week
So he writes for 572*11=<<572*11=6292>>6292 minutes a week
So he writes 6292/60=<<6292/60=104>>104 hours a week
#### 104
